templateOptions.label: Service Address
templateOptions.description: The Service Address of the SCIM endpoint

templateOptions.label: Client ID
templateOptions.description: The Client ID of the Provider for External User Management in Zenya

templateOptions.label: Client Secret
templateOptions.description: The Client Secret of the Provider for External User Management in Zenya

templateOptions.label: Update on correlate
templateOptions.description: When toggled, if the mapped data differs from data in Zenya, the Zenya account will be updated on the create event (not just correlated).

templateOptions.label: Set department in Zenya
templateOptions.description: Please note. Currently, we can only set a department that already exists in Zenya. For this, all departments must have a unique name (we can only match on name, so matching on code or any other field is not possible) within the entire tree (i.e., no duplicate names anywhere). In addition, maintenance of the departments (i.e., creating/deleting as well as setting the owner) will need to take place within Zenya.

templateOptions.label: Set manager in Zenya
templateOptions.description: Please note. Currently, we can only set a manager that exists in Zenya and has been created by HelloID. For this, HelloID has to have granted the Account entitlement for the manager first.

templateOptions.label: Toggle debug logging
templateOptions.description: When toggled, debug logging will be displayed
